title: Clovis Goods 22S0301-36, 36 x 28 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)
item_description:
Clovis Goods 22S0301-36, 36 x 28 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)

Condition: NEW
Features:
LED mirror is specially designed for those who love fashion and modernization
Anti-fog function - Eliminates the trouble of not being able to use the mirror when needed
High polished edges offers a finished, sleek look, and facilitate safety and cleaning Simply touch the power switch button for 2-3 seconds to adjust the brightness from 10% to 100%
3 Color temperature 3000K-6000K dimmable illuminates with a CRI of more than 95
The brightness settings are automatically stored, so you don't need to adjust the brightness every time
Specifications:
Material: Glass
Shape: Rectangle
Weight: 20 lbs
Dimensions:
Width: 36 Inch
Thickness: 1 1/4 Inch
Height: 28 Inch
Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
